description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in NicheAddons Sales Page Addon – Elementor & Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sales Page Addon – Elementor & Beaver Builder: from n/a through 1.4.2.

product.name: Sales Page Addon – Elementor & Beaver Builder
